verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>happened<s%> at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2492>dream,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H2975>Nile.<s%>

And <S%H2009>lo,<s%> from the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> there <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6510>cows,<s%> <S%H3303>sleek<s%> and <S%H1277>fat;<s%> and they <S%H7462>grazed<s%> in the <S%H260>marsh<s%> <S%H260>grass.<s%>

Then <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them from the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> <S%H7451>ugly<s%> and <S%H1851>gaunt,<s%> <S%H1320><s%> and they <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the [other] <S%H6510>cows<s%> on the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile.<s%>

And the <S%H7451>ugly<s%> and <S%H1851>gaunt<s%> <S%H1320><s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> up the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3303>sleek<s%> and <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6510>cows.<s%> Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3364>awoke.<s%>

And he <S%H3462>fell<s%> <S%H3462>asleep<s%> and <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> of <S%H7641>grain<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up on a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H7070>stalk,<s%> <S%H1277>plump<s%> and <S%H2896>good.<s%>

Then <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7641>ears,<s%> <S%H1851>thin<s%> and <S%H7710>scorched<s%> by the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6921>wind,<s%> <S%H6779>sprouted<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them.

And the <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1277>plump<s%> and <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H7641>ears.<s%> Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3364>awoke,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [it was] a <S%H2472>dream.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> that his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled,<s%> so he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men.<s%> And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> them his <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who could <S%H6622>interpret<s%> them to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

Then the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I would make <S%H2142>mention<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> of my [own] <S%H2399>offenses.<s%>

<S%H6547>"Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>furious<s%> with his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> me in <S%H4929>confinement<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard,<s%> [both] me and the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker.<s%>

"And we <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> on the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> he and I; <S%H376>each<s%> of us <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> according to the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of his [own] <S%H2472>dream.<s%>

"Now a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5288>youth<s%> [was] with us <S%H8033>there,<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard,<s%> and we <S%H5608>related<s%> [them] to him, and he <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> our <S%H2472>dreams<s%> for us. To <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> he <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> according to his [own] <S%H2472>dream.<s%>

"And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that <S%H9201>just<s%> as he <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> for us, <S%H3651>so<s%> it <S%H1961>happened;<s%> he <S%H7725>restored<s%> me in my <S%H3653>office,<s%> but he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> him."

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and they <S%H7323>hurriedly<s%> <S%H7323>brought<s%> him out of the <S%H953>dungeon;<s%> and when he had <S%H1548>shaved<s%> himself and <S%H2498>changed<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "I have <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> but <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> can <S%H6622>interpret<s%> it; and I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> it <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> you, that when you <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> you can <S%H6622>interpret<s%> it."

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "It is not in me; <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6030>give<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> a <S%H7965>favorable<s%> <S%H6030>answer.<s%>"
So <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "In my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I was <S%H5975>standing<s%> on the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile;<s%>

and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6510>cows,<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> and <S%H3303>sleek<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of the <S%H2975>Nile;<s%> and they <S%H7462>grazed<s%> in the <S%H260>marsh<s%> <S%H260>grass.<s%>

"And <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>ugly<s%> and <S%H7534>gaunt,<s%> <S%H1320><s%> <S%H2007>such<s%> as I had <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> for <S%H7455>ugliness<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>
and the <S%H7534>lean<s%> and <S%H7451>ugly<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> up the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6510>cows.<s%>

"Yet when they had <S%H935>devoured<s%> <S%H7130><s%> them, it could not be <S%H3045>detected<s%> that they had <S%H935>devoured<s%> <S%H7130><s%> them; for they were <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H7451>ugly<s%> as <S%H8462>before.<s%> Then I <S%H3364>awoke.<s%>

"I <S%H7200>saw<s%> also in my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7641>ears,<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> and <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up on a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H7070>stalk;<s%>

and <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7641>ears,<s%> <S%H6798>withered,<s%> <S%H1851>thin,<s%> [and] <S%H7710>scorched<s%> by the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6921>wind,<s%> <S%H6779>sprouted<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them;

and the <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7641>ears.<s%> Then I <S%H559>told<s%> it to the <S%H2748>magicians,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who could <S%H5046>explain<s%> it to me. "

Now <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H6547>"Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2472>dreams<s%> are <S%H259>one<s%> [and the same;] <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5046>told<s%> to Pharaoh <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> He is about to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> the <S%H2472>dreams<s%> are <S%H259>one<s%> [and the same.]

"And the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7534>lean<s%> and <S%H7451>ugly<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> that <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> them are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7534>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H7710>scorched<s%> by the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6921>wind<s%> shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine.<s%>
"It is as I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7200>shown<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> He is about to <S%H6213>do.<s%>
<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7647>abundance<s%> are <S%H935>coming<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

and <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> will <S%H6965>come,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7647>abundance<s%> will be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> will <S%H3615>ravage<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"So the <S%H7647>abundance<s%> will be <S%H3045>unknown<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of that <S%H310>subsequent<s%> <S%H7458>famine;<s%> for it [will be] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe.<s%>

"Now as for the <S%H8138>repeating<s%> of the <S%H2472>dream<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6471>twice,<s%> [it means] that the <S%H1697>matter<s%> is <S%H3559>determined<s%> by <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H6213>bring<s%> it <S%H6213>about.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H995>discerning<s%> and <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and <S%H7896>set<s%> him <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"Let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6213>take<s%> <S%H6213>action<s%> to <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H6496>overseers<s%> in <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and let him <S%H2567>exact<s%> a <S%H2567>fifth<s%> [of the produce] of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7647>abundance.<s%>

"Then let them <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3978>food<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> that are <S%H935>coming,<s%> and <S%H6651>store<s%> up the <S%H1250>grain<s%> for <S%H400>food<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H3027>authority,<s%> and let them <S%H8104>guard<s%> [it.]

"And let the <S%H400>food<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> as a <S%H6487>reserve<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> for the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will <S%H1961>occur<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> may not <S%H3772>perish<s%> during the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>"
Now the <S%H1697>proposal<s%> <S%H3190>seemed<s%> <S%H3190>good<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> "Can we <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> like <S%H2088>this,<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> is a <S%H430>divine<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>?"

So <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H310>"Since<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3045>informed<s%> you of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> so <S%H995>discerning<s%> and <S%H2450>wise<s%> as you are.

"You shall be <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5921>according<s%> to your <S%H6310>command<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H5401>do<s%> <S%H5401>homage;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> I will be <S%H1431>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> you."
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H7200>"See<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5493>took<s%> <S%H5493>off<s%> his <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>ring<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on Joseph's <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him in <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H7242>necklace<s%> <S%H5921>around<s%> his <S%H6677>neck.<s%>

And he had him <S%H7392>ride<s%> in his <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H4818>chariot;<s%> and they <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H86>"Bow<s%> the <S%H86>knee!<s%>" And he <S%H5414>set<s%> him <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Moreover, <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "[Though] I am <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> yet <S%H1107>without<s%> your permission <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> shall <S%H7311>raise<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> or <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> Zaphenath-paneah; and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H621>Asenath,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Potiphera<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On,<s%> as his <S%H802>wife.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Now <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And during the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7647>plenty<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6213>brought<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H7062>abundantly.<s%>

So he <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> of [these] <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>occurred<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5414>placed<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities;<s%> he <S%H5414>placed<s%> in every <S%H5892>city<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> from its own <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H7704>fields.<s%>
